attributes.action: Increase Incapacity benefit to a livable level for those genuinely claiming due to disability, accident  or ill health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increase Incapacity benefit to a livable level, whilst ensuring those who do claim are doing so genuinely, Give all those who do claim Incapacity benefit the same rights as those who claim Income support, IE:- Automatic entitlement to full help with Rent and Council tax, automatic FULL help with all NHS charges, entitlement to claim Social fund loans, Crisis loans, Budgeting loans, as on high rate Incapacity benefit although it is approximately £15 per wk more than Income support you would NOT be entitled to free NHS charges, and all previously stated benefits, or be able to apply for any social loans, so is it fair when Incapacity claimants quite often end up worse off than those on Income support???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
